Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️🇷🇺🇸🇾 Russia prepares first visit to new Syria? ❗️Mosco...
Description: Forwarded From ShamS⚡️🇷🇺🇸🇾 Russia prepares first visit to new Syria?❗️Moscow intends to send a delegation to Damascus amid active contacts with the country's new authoritiesMikhail Bogdanov, Russian Deputy FM may become the first Russian official to visit Syria since the fall of the Assad regime. However, the date of the visit has not yet been set and the originally planned trip is to be postponed.Russian FM Sergei Lavrov said Moscow is ready to cooperate with Syria's new leadership. Bogdanov had emphasised relations between Russia and Syria are entering a new qualitative turning point, and both sides must build on the deep legacy of friendship between the Russian and Syrian peoples.Lavrov discussed the situation in Syria with the Saudi FM. The ministers spoke in favor of establishing inclusive dialogue on Syria that would involve all political forces, ethnic groups, and confessions as well as foreign players who push for maintaining Syria’s sovereignty, independence, unity, and territorial integrity.Telegram | X

Description: 🇵🇸🇮🇱⚡️- Israeli Defense Minister Katz has cancelled all administrative detention orders against West Bank settlers.Administrative detention is the practice of arresting individuals and holding them without trial for upwards of 6 months, although it may be indefinitely renewed by Israeli authorities. The practice is primarily used against Palestinians, however many settlers are held in administrative detention as well.With the Defense Minister's order to release all West Bank settlers from administrative detention, this could have dire consequences for Palestinians living in the West Bank.

Description: 🇺🇸⚡️- Donald Trump has announced plans to create an External Revenue Service to collect tariffs, duties, and other revenues from foreign sources.  Historically, this function was performed by the US Revenue Cutter Service, the predecessor to the US Coast Guard, until it was reorganized in 1915. Title: 🎬 🇮🇷⚡- -These are false notions created by the oppressors that...
Description: 🇮🇷⚡- -These are false notions created by the oppressors that claim these [Hezbollah, Hamas, Ansarullah, etc.] are Iran's proxies.They [who say such things] want us to turn the fight against the occupation [Israel]. They want a conflict between Iran and Israel [a first, a senior Iranian official calling Israel by Israel]. But this is not a fight between Iran and Israel!Iran only provides moral support to these forces [Hezbollah, Hamas, etc.]. This motivational [moral] support is Iran's power. But we did not hire them to act on our behalf.What we did was give people the ability to believe that they could stand up. Our revolution gave them this motivation.- - Mohammad Javad Zarif, Vice President for Strategic Affairs and former Foreign Minister of Iran.Israel has hit Iran and pro-Iranian groups so hard since October 7th 2023, that even Iran is now confused on which side they stand.

Title: 🔁 ⚡️🇸🇦🇸🇾 Outcome of the Riyadh Meetings on Syria ❗️Participa...
Description: Forwarded From ShamS⚡️🇸🇦🇸🇾 Outcome of the Riyadh Meetings on Syria❗️Participants at the meeting called for immediate Israeli withdrawal from occupied Syrian territories in the south but ignored Turkish occupation in the north-eastThe foreign ministers and representatives of Arab and Western countries discussed the steps to support the Syrian people and provide them with all the aid and support in this critical phase of their history. The discussions also focused on helping Syrians to rebuild their country as a unified, independent and safe Arab state for all its citizens, with no place for terrorism, no breach of its sovereignty or aggression on its territorial integrity from any party.The participants discussed their support for a Syrian political transitional process represented by Syrian political and social forces that preserves the rights of all Syrians with the participation of various components of the Syrian people. This is also to work to address any challenges or sources of concern for various parties through dialogue and providing support, advice and consultation in a manner that respects Syria's independence and sovereignty, taking into account that the future of Syria is the concern of the Syrians, stressing their support for the choices of the Syrian people and respecting their will.❗️The ministers also expressed their concern about Israel's incursion into the buffer zone with Syria and the neighboring sites in Mount Hermon and Quneitra governorate, stressing the importance of respecting Syria's unity, sovereignty and territorial integrity.⁉️ However, the discussions noticeably avoided addressing Turkey's ongoing military operations and occupation of cities in NE Syria. The extensive attacks and alleged violations by Turkish forces were absent from the statement, despite their continued impact on the region and Syrian stability.Telegram | X

Title: 🇷🇺🇸🇾⚡- Russian military general in Syria, Oleg Blokhin, says ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇸🇾⚡- Russian military general in Syria, Oleg Blokhin, says -for four days our military convoys have been stuck,- and our -ships have been standing at anchor since January 5- in Syria. He says the new authorities won't supply electricity to the Russian military units, as a result the Russians are unable to withdraw.-It has not yet been possible to agree on a normal solution for the evacuation of our base,- says Blokhin. And says that the Russian units in Syria have been -taken hostage,- with the new Syrian government -resorting to blackmail.- Blokhin says that the Syrian government has cut all communications with Russia's main Khmeimim military base, and are seeking to -communicate with someone of higher rank- in Moscow.With the reason being for -Russia to remove the status of terrorists from Hayat Tahrir al-Sham, and Abu Muhammad al-Julani.- The second reason being -is to demand payment for the opportunity to calmly evacuate our bases. And the payment, in addition to money, may include food and fuel, which the new authorities of the former Syria are running out of catastrophically quickly.-

Title: ↩️🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 - It has been 5 months since Ukraine launched its a...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces have captured Maryevka and Pogrebki, in the Kursk region of Russia. Drone footage confirms the advance, showing Russian troops inside Pogrebki's church, which we have geolocated to 51.37812, 35.227. In Nikolaevka, fierce fighting continues. 🇷🇺🇺🇦 - It has been 5 months since Ukraine launched its ambitious Kursk military operation.Ukraine currently controls 427.5 sqkm of Kursk, while Russia has recaptured 683 sqkm of area.In the same time of 5 months, Russia has captured:311 sqkm in the Kupyansk-Borova direction;174 sqkm in the Limen-Sivers'k direction;54 sqkm in the Chasov-Yar direction;554 sqkm in the Toretsk-Pokrovsk direction;1661 sqkm in the Kurakhovo-Velikaya Novoselka direction and80 sqkm in the Gulyaipoloe-Orekhov direction.In total, Russian forces have captured 3517 sqkm (including recaptured Kursk territory), which is over 8 times more than what Ukraine currently holds in Kursk (427.5 sqkm). Some of the fronts in the Donbass region had not moved for two years up until the Kursk operation began, however, the Ukrainian authorities are still adamant the Kursk operation did not affect the front elsewhere.

Title: ↩️ 🇱🇾 - The situation in western Libya was likely orchestrated ...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇱🇾⚡- Pro-GNA activists in Tajouri demand, in a statement, the -overthrow of Dbiebah- and the -arrest of Najla al-Mangoush- for admitting to meet Eli Cohen. 🇱🇾 - The situation in western Libya was likely orchestrated by Qatar purposefully.Former Tripoli's Foreign Minister, Najla al-Mangoush's interview in which she confesses to meeting Eli Cohen was published by the pro Muslim Brotherhood outlet, al-Jazeera, to cause unrest against the Misrata-based National Unity Government (NUG), led by 'Prime Minister' Dbiebah.The NUG was established after the escalation in fighting between 2019-2020. The NUG was to bring together the Tripoli-based Government of National Accord (GNA) and the Tobruk-based House of Representatives (HoR). The HoR was, and still is, supported militarily by Khalifa Haftar's LNA. The HoR pushed for Dbiebah to lead the newly established Misrata-based NUG. After Dbiebah began attacking US-backed Sadiq al-Kabir (then the Governor of Libya's Central Bank), the HoR withdrew their support and set-up a rival to the NUG, the Government of National Stability (GNS) based in Benghazi. The GNS is currently led by Osama Hamada.The NUG is no longer supported by the HoR (and therefore Khalifa Haftar) and lacks support amongst the GNA, as he wasn't their choice when the NUG was initially being established.The recent flare ups in western Libya look like they are aimed at toppling the NUG entirely, with Misrata falling back to the GNA. And as a result, things will return to pre-2021, two separate governments. Note, the GNA's military (mostly independent brigades) are mainly financed by Qatar and Turkey. With a majority of the mercenaries being the very same people who travelled to Syria to topple Bashar al-Assad.

Title: 🔁🎬 ⚡️🇺🇸🇸🇾📹 Why Pentagon Denies Establishing US Base at Kob...
Description: Forwarded From ShamS⚡️🇺🇸🇸🇾📹 Why Pentagon Denies Establishing US Base at KobaniA Pentagon spokesperson Sabrina Singh publicly dismissed rumors that US troops would establish a military base at Kobani the Syrian Kurdish stronghold border town, which remains under threat by Turkey-backed rebels and Turkish army. -When it comes to US forces in Kobani, there's no plan or intent right now to set up any base,- Pentagon deputy press secretary Sabrina Singh told.The Pentagon's denial came in response to local claims on social media after video circulated appearing to show contractors erecting concrete blast walls around a disused hotel in Kobani. Local sources emphasized that the blast walls resembled those used around US bases in the region, and said that US troops had patrolled in the area in recent weeks.Construction of the US base continues. Apparently, the United States has decided to support SDF and prevent its NATO ally Turkey from invading Kobani for an operation to expand control in northern Syria.Telegram | X

Title: ↩️🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Ukraine has built a vast amount of defensive stru...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Ukraine has begun building three massive lines of defenses in the Zaporozhye and Dnepr regions to defend against attacks from the east. Ukrainian authorities claim the first line is almost complete, satellite imagery confirms their claim. The first… 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Ukraine has built a vast amount of defensive structures in the Dnepr region (mapped in yellow).In late October we reported that Ukraine had begun constructing new lines of fortifications in the Dnepr and Zaporozhye regions. The map above shows the rapid progress by the Ukrainian side, with yellow being the new structures and red are the existing structures.Ukraine seems to be building three lines of defenses facing eastwards, with two in front of the Dnepr river. And two lines of defenses facing southwards. The other notable work can be seen around Pavlograd, which has effectively been surrounded by fortifications. Ukrainian defenses are also visible on the left-bank of the Dnepr, especially around Dnepr International Airport.

Title: 🔁🖼 🇺🇸🇮🇱⚠️ The FBI intercepted a potential plot targeting em...
Description: Forwarded From TabZ - Alternative Media (TabZ)🇺🇸🇮🇱⚠️ The FBI intercepted a potential plot targeting employees at a Florida office of the American Israel Public Affairs Committee (AIPAC), according to court documents filed Monday.Forrest Kendall Pemberton was arrested after traveling to Plantation, Florida, with several firearms, including an AR-15 rifle, and allegedly scouting out AIPAC’s former office location. The affidavit, signed by FBI Special Agent Taylor Nicklin, states that Pemberton planned to return to the site with weapons but was stopped by law enforcement on December 25, the first night of Hanukkah.Pemberton's father alerted authorities on December 23 after discovering a letter left by his son, suggesting he intended to -close the loop- and -stoke the flames.- Further investigation revealed that Pemberton had searched for AIPAC’s former Plantation office on Google Maps, along with IRS locations in the area.After checking into a hotel near AIPAC's previous office on December 22 and leaving on December 23, Pemberton was later traced to a Tallahassee hotel. He was apprehended on December 25 while entering a ride-share vehicle with what appeared to be a soft rifle case.Pemberton admitted to targeting AIPAC due to its -political influence- and expressed frustration with the -status quo.- However, he claimed he had ultimately decided against carrying out any criminal action.The court documents describe AIPAC as an organization that -advocates and lobbies for pro-Israel policies,- echoing language on its website. Pemberton remains in custody as the investigation continues.@TabZLIVE
